item.title: My Computing History
item.description: Part one, hardware. // the feeling of reaching out – modem My computing history begins with me pestering my parents until they got me a computer. I didn’t know what hardware existed, but I knew I needed a computer. My first computer was the Tandy Color Computer 2. Image from wikimedia https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:TRS-80_Color_Computer_2-64K.jpg This computer was affectionaly dubbed the CoCo by its adherents elsewhere, but I didn’t learn this nickname until much later.
